definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: winnowing-shovel, or the like (√ unknown; Thes fr. [[רוח]] = ventilabrum, cf. Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 728; Wetzst in De:Is (2), 709 fr. [[רחה]] = raxuwa be soft, loose, friable, etc., cf. Kö:ii. 1, 177; NH = BH, Ar. raxtun is prob. loan-wd. Nö:l.c.);—[[וּבַמִּזְרֶה]] ´[[זׁרֶה בָר]]: Is 30:24.
